All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.peer.ComponentPeer, java.awt.peer.LightweightPeer
class VirtualLightweightPeer
extends VirtualComponentPeer
implements java.awt.peer.LightweightPeer

AWT lightweight component peers that does nothing. Used for VirtualToolkit.
